page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content:
Of all the homes in the three villages 60% to 80% are owned by the families living in them.Most have coal or oil fired central heating with some degree of thermal insulation.
Life revolves around work,television, car,house and garden maintenance and hobbies usually in that order.The financial and time priority given to keeping a car and the independance it gives is second only to the home.
About 65% of working people work outside the immediate locality travelling up to 30 miles away each day.Many wives are in part or full time employment,again most outside the villages leaving little time for leisure after household duties.Only 20% of homes have children.
